ns1:group.name: Administrators
ns1:group.description: Administrators can view and modify all resource attributes and start and stop servers.

ns1:group.name: Deployers
ns1:group.description: Deployers can view all resource attributes and deploy applications.

ns1:group.name: Operators
ns1:group.description: Operators can view and modify all resource attributes and perform server lifecycle operations.

ns1:group.name: Monitors
ns1:group.description: Monitors can view and modify all resource attributes and perform operations not restricted by roles.

ns1:role.name: Admin
ns1:role.description: View/modify the server configuration, deploy applications and start/stop servers.

ns1:role.name: Deployer
ns1:role.description: View the server configuration and deploy applications.

ns1:role.name: Operator
ns1:role.description: View the server configuration and start/stop servers.

ns1:role.name: Monitor
ns1:role.description: View the server configuration. Provides read-only access to the Admin Console.
